---
title: "Phage type"
date: 2024-03-16
format: html
---


```{r echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

plot <- read_tsv("rawdata/clean_genomes_data.tsv") %>%
    select(molecule) %>%
    count(molecule) %>%
    ggplot(aes(
        x = molecule,
        y = n
    )) +
    geom_col() +
    scale_y_continuous(
        expand = c(0, 0),
        limits = c(0, 27000),
        breaks = seq(0, 270000, 3000)
    ) +
    labs(
        x = NULL,
        y = "Number of phages"
    ) +
    theme(
        text = element_text(size = 15),
        panel.background = element_blank(),
        panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", fill = NA, linewidth = 1)
    )

ggplotly(plot)
```
